name: Vex the Voidwalker
backstory: A traveler who has walked between dimensions so many times the boundaries have blurred for her. She sees echoes of other realities overlapping with this one. Her knowledge of the End, Nether, and stranger places is unmatched.
dialogue_style: Speaks about dimensions overlapping. References 'the spaces between'. Uses phrases like 'I've seen it in another when' and 'reality is thinner here'. Occasionally trails off mid-sentence as if seeing something else.
